This is a [link](https://www.google.com/) to a good data science tool. Here's a link to [P8105](https://p8105.com/). Here's a link to the [about](about.html) page

YOu can also still use R!

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```


```{r}
plot_df = 
  tibble(
    x=runif(100),
    y= 1+2+x+rnorm(100)
  )

plot_df |>
  ggplot(aes(x=x, y=y)) +
  geom_point()
```
